articles.title: Boosters, masks and mandates: Biden's team sorts through options for containing Covid surge among unvaccinated Americans - CNN
articles.description: The Biden administration is debating a series of steps to further contain the Covid-19 pandemic, which, after 18 months, is again surging in parts of the country where vaccination rates are low.

articles.title: How to convince loved ones to get covid vaccine - The Washington Post
articles.description: The vaccines are proven safe and are more widely available than ever, but many Americans are struggling to convince vaccine-hesitant loved ones of the importance of getting the shots.

articles.title: Scenes From America’s Largest Wildfire - The New York Times
articles.description: Small fires burned inside hollowed-out trees. Smoke rose from the blackened dirt. On the edge of the Bootleg Fire in southern Oregon, firefighters worked to halt the advance of the flames.
